name: Minjas: Stronger Together (DougDevs)
description:
Originally created for the February 2021 Brackeys Jam, this game has been updated to fix bugs, include more audio features and sound effects, and add New Game +.

Controls: 

WASD: move

Left Click: Throw Kunai

Right Click: Throw Shuriken

Tips:

Watch out for the backswing of the sword-wielding enemies

Aim for the Demon King's eyes, then hit his tongue to deal damage

Note: The following 3rd party Assets were used:

Snaps Art Asian Garden HD

Maximo Animations: Great Sword Casting, Great Sword Walk

Christine Designs - Balloons and Bunting

Everything else was made by our team! Thanks for playing.
